# VirtualScrollerRuntimeParams interface

[VirtualScroller](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller) parameters that may change over time. Used as [VirtualScroller.set()](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.set) argument type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface VirtualScrollerRuntimeParams 
```

## Remarks

Implemented as interface for better documentation output (api-extractor)
